nodes.text: TK-571 was a stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire.

Sometime following 0 ABY, TK-571 was part of a stormtrooper unit that guarded a statue of Emperor Palpatine installed in front of the Theed Royal Palace on Naboo during that year's Empire Day celebrations.
TK-571 was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He made appearances during the Empire Day live events of 2009 through 2011.
